metadata.title: Türk Hukuk Terminolojisi Sözlüğü
metadata.description: İngilizce-Amerikan hukuk terimlerinin Türk hukuk sistemindeki karşılıkları

1. Genel Hukuk Terimleri.description: Temel hukuk kavramları ve genel terimler

terms.definition_tr: Toplumda düzeni sağlayan, kişilerin davranışlarını düzenleyen kurallar bütünü
terms.definition_en: A system of rules that governs behavior and affairs in a society
terms.usage_example_tr: Türk hukukunda Medeni Kanun temel kanunlardan biridir.
terms.usage_example_en: Civil Code is one of the fundamental laws in Turkish law.

terms.definition_tr: Hak ettiği şeyi vermek, hakkı teslim etmek
terms.definition_en: The quality of being fair and just
terms.usage_example_en: Justice is the foundation of government.

terms.definition_tr: Yasaların devlet iktidarı üzerinde üstün olduğu, herkesin yasa önünde eşit olduğu devlet sistemi
terms.definition_en: A system of government where all people and institutions are subject to the law
terms.usage_example_tr: Demokratik devletler hukuk devleti ilkesine dayanır.
terms.usage_example_en: Democratic states are based on the rule of law.

terms.definition_tr: Hukuki sonuç doğurmak amacıyla yapılan irade açıklaması
terms.definition_en: An expression of will intended to have legal effects
terms.usage_example_en: Contracts are the most common legal transactions.

terms.definition_tr: Hukuki yükümlülüklerden doğan ve zararın telafi edilmesini gerektiren durum
terms.definition_en: Legal responsibility for damages that requires compensation
terms.usage_example_tr: Haksız fiilden doğan hukuki sorumluluk vardır.
terms.usage_example_en: Civil liability arises from wrongful acts.

2. Türk Hukuk Sistemi ve Yargı.description: Türk hukuk sistemi yapısı ve yargı kolları

terms.definition_tr: Kişiler arasındaki özel hukuki uyuşmazlıkları ve ceza davalarını gören yargı kolu
terms.definition_en: Judicial branch handling private legal disputes and criminal cases
terms.usage_example_tr: Adli yargıda Asliye Hukuk Mahkemeleri bulunur.
terms.usage_example_en: Civil Courts of First Instance exist in judicial jurisdiction.

terms.definition_tr: İdare ile vatandaşlar arasındaki uyuşmazlıkları gören yargı kolu
terms.definition_en: Judicial branch handling disputes between administration and citizens
terms.usage_example_tr: İdari işlemlerden doğan uyuşmazlıklar idari yargıda çözülür.
terms.usage_example_en: Disputes arising from administrative acts are resolved in administrative jurisdiction.

terms.definition_tr: Kanunların Anayasaya uygunluğunu denetleyen ve temel hakları koruyan yüksek mahkeme
terms.definition_en: High court reviewing constitutionality of laws and protecting fundamental rights
terms.usage_example_tr: Anayasa Mahkemesi'ne bireysel başvuru hakkı vardır.
terms.usage_example_en: There is a right of individual application to the Constitutional Court.

terms.definition_tr: Adli yargıda son inceleme merci olarak görev yapan yüksek mahkeme
terms.definition_en: Supreme court as final review authority in judicial jurisdiction
terms.usage_example_tr: Yargıtay adli yargı kararlarının son inceleme mercii.
terms.usage_example_en: The Supreme Court of Appeals is the final review authority for judicial decisions.

terms.definition_tr: İdari yargının en yüksek mercii olan yüksek mahkeme
terms.definition_en: Supreme court of administrative jurisdiction
terms.usage_example_tr: Danıştay idari yargının en yüksek mercii.
terms.usage_example_en: The Council of State is the highest authority of administrative jurisdiction.

terms.definition_tr: Asliye Hukuk Mahkemelerine göre daha sınırlı görevli olan ilk derece mahkemesi
terms.definition_en: First instance court with limited jurisdiction compared to Civil Courts
terms.usage_example_tr: Basit uyuşmazlıklar Sulh Hukuk Mahkemesi'nde çözülür.
terms.usage_example_en: Simple disputes are resolved in Peace Court.

terms.definition_tr: Özel hukuk alanındaki ana dava türlerini gören ilk derece mahkemesi
terms.definition_en: First instance court handling main types of private law cases
terms.usage_example_tr: Borçlar hukuku davaları Asliye Hukuk Mahkemesi'nde açılır.
terms.usage_example_en: Law of obligations cases are filed in Civil Court of First Instance.

terms.definition_tr: Suçlara ilişkin ilk derece ceza mahkemesi
terms.definition_en: First instance criminal court
terms.usage_example_tr: Çoğu suç Asliye Ceza Mahkemesi'nde yargılanır.
terms.usage_example_en: Most crimes are tried in Criminal Court of First Instance.

terms.definition_tr: Ağır suçları yargılayan özel ceza mahkemesi
terms.definition_en: Special criminal court trying serious crimes
terms.usage_example_tr: Adam öldürme suçları Ağır Ceza Mahkemesi'nde yargılanır.
terms.usage_example_en: Homicide crimes are tried in Assize Court.

terms.definition_tr: İlk derece mahkemelerinin kararlarına karşı istinaf başvurularını inceleyen mahkeme
terms.definition_en: Court examining appeals against decisions of first instance courts
terms.usage_example_tr: İlk derece mahkeme kararlarına karşı Bölge Adliye Mahkemesi'ne itiraz edilebilir.
terms.usage_example_en: Decisions of first instance courts can be appealed to Regional Court of Justice.

3. Sivil Hukuk - Kişiler Hukuku.description: Kişiler hakları ve kişilik hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: İnsan olan ve hukuki kişiliği olan varlık
terms.definition_en: A human being with legal personality
terms.usage_example_tr: Her gerçek kişi hak ehliyetine sahiptir.
terms.usage_example_en: Every natural person has legal capacity.

terms.definition_tr: İnsan dışında hukuki kişiliğe sahip varlık
terms.definition_en: Non-human entity with legal personality
terms.usage_example_en: Companies are legal persons.

terms.definition_en: Ability to hold rights
terms.usage_example_tr: Herkes doğumdan itibaren hak ehliyetine sahiptir.
terms.usage_example_en: Everyone has legal capacity from birth.

terms.definition_en: Ability to enter into legal transactions
terms.usage_example_en: Minors have limited capacity to act.

terms.definition_tr: Reşit olma, tam fiil ehliyetine sahip olma
terms.definition_en: Reaching the age of legal majority
terms.usage_example_en: 18 years is considered the age of majority.

terms.definition_tr: Ebeveynin çocuğa karşı sahip olduğu hak ve yükümlülüklerin bütünü
terms.definition_en: Total rights and obligations of parents towards their child
terms.usage_example_tr: Velayet reşit olmayan çocuklar üzerinde kullanılır.
terms.usage_example_en: Parental authority is exercised over minor children.

terms.definition_tr: Kişinin fiil ehliyetine kanunen getirilen sınırlamalar
terms.definition_en: Legal limitations on a person's capacity to act
terms.usage_example_en: Mental illness is a ground for restriction.

terms.definition_tr: Kişinin asıl olarak yaşamaya niyet ettiği yer
terms.definition_en: Place where a person intends to live permanently
terms.usage_example_en: There is freedom to change domicile.

4. Eşya Hukuku.description: Eşya üzerindeki haklar ve eşya hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: İnsan üzerinde hakimiyet kurulabilen ve ekonomik değeri olan maddi varlık
terms.definition_en: Material object that can be controlled by humans and has economic value
terms.usage_example_en: Property is subject to absolute rights.

terms.definition_tr: Eşya üzerinde en geniş hakkı veren ayni hak
terms.definition_en: Real right granting the broadest authority over property
terms.usage_example_en: Ownership right is absolute.

terms.definition_en: Factual control over property
terms.usage_example_en: Possession is factual control over property.

terms.definition_tr: Eşyaya doğrudan doğruya yönelen ve herkese karşı ileri sürülebilen hak
terms.definition_en: Right directly relating to property and enforceable against everyone
terms.usage_example_en: Ownership is the most important real right.

terms.definition_tr: Taşınmaz mallara ilişkin hakların kayıtlı olduğu resmî defter
terms.definition_en: Official register recording rights related to immovable property
terms.usage_example_tr: Taşınmaz malların mülkiyeti tapu siciline kayıtlıdır.
terms.usage_example_en: Ownership of immovable property is recorded in the land registry.

terms.definition_tr: Borç güvencesi için eşya üzerinde kurulan sınırlı ayni hak
terms.definition_en: Limited real right established on property as security for debt
terms.usage_example_en: Pledge right is established for security purposes.

terms.definition_en: Person who owes a debt
terms.usage_example_en: Debtor can pledge their property.

terms.definition_tr: Borcu olan kişiden alacağı olan kişi
terms.definition_en: Person to whom a debt is owed
terms.usage_example_en: Creditor has pledge right.

terms.definition_tr: Asıl hakkın varlığı ile varlık kazanan hak
terms.definition_en: Right whose existence depends on the existence of a principal right
terms.usage_example_en: Pledge right is an accessory right.

5. Borçlar Hukuku.description: Borç ilişkileri ve borçlar hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: Borçlunun alacaklıya karşı edimini yerine getirme zorunluluğu
terms.definition_en: Obligation of debtor to perform to creditor
terms.usage_example_en: Obligation can arise from contract.

terms.definition_tr: İki veya daha çok kişi arasında borç doğuran hukuki işlem
terms.definition_en: Legal transaction creating obligations between two or more persons
terms.usage_example_en: Contract is established by meeting of minds.

terms.definition_en: Liberation of debtor from debt
terms.usage_example_en: Debt ends with release.

terms.definition_tr: Zarar veren fiil nedeniyle uğranılan zararın karşılanması
terms.definition_en: Covering loss caused by harmful act
terms.usage_example_en: Compensation can be claimed for wrongful act.

terms.definition_en: Amount to be paid in case of non-compliance with contract
terms.usage_example_en: Penalty clause is agreed in contract.

terms.definition_en: Fulfillment of the object of obligation
terms.usage_example_en: Performance ends the obligation.

terms.definition_tr: Borç konusu edimin yerine getirilemez hale gelmesi
terms.definition_en: Rendering fulfillment of obligation impossible
terms.usage_example_en: Impossibility removes the obligation.

terms.definition_en: Ending of contract
terms.usage_example_tr: Ahdi bozma ile fesih bir olaydır.
terms.usage_example_en: Breaking the contract is termination.

terms.definition_tr: Borçlunun ödeme güçlüğü içinde bulunması durumu
terms.definition_en: State of debtor being unable to pay debts
terms.usage_example_en: Composition can be requested in bankruptcy.

terms.definition_en: Right held against debtor
terms.usage_example_en: Claim can be assigned.

6. Ticaret Hukuku.description: Ticari işlemler ve şirket hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: Sermayesi paylara bölünmüş, ortakları sınırlı sorumlu olan şirket türü
terms.definition_en: Company with capital divided into shares and limited liability shareholders
terms.usage_example_en: Joint stock companies can go public.

terms.definition_tr: Sınırlı sorumlu ortaklardan oluşan şirket türü
terms.definition_en: Company consisting of limited liability partners
terms.usage_example_tr: Limited şirketler en yaygın şirket türlerindendir.
terms.usage_example_en: Limited liability companies are among the most common types of companies.

terms.definition_tr: Ortaklarının sorumluluğu sınırsız olan şirket türü
terms.definition_en: Type of company with unlimited liability of partners
terms.usage_example_tr: Kollektif şirkette ortaklar şirket borçlarından kişisel olarak sorumludur.
terms.usage_example_en: In general partnership, partners are personally liable for company debts.

terms.definition_tr: Bazı ortakları sınırlı, bazıları sınırsız sorumlu olan şirket türü
terms.definition_en: Type of company where some partners have limited, others unlimited liability
terms.usage_example_tr: Komandit şirkette komanditer ortak sınırlı sorumludur.
terms.usage_example_en: In limited partnership, limited partners have limited liability.

terms.definition_en: Organized enterprise engaged in economic activity
terms.usage_example_en: Commercial enterprise falls under Commercial Code.

terms.definition_en: Name of commercial enterprise
terms.usage_example_tr: Her ticari işletmenin ticaret unvanı olmalıdır.
terms.usage_example_en: Every commercial enterprise must have a trade name.

terms.definition_tr: Ticari işletmelerin kayıtlarının tutulduğu resmî defter
terms.definition_en: Official register where commercial enterprises are recorded
terms.usage_example_tr: Şirketler ticaret siciline kayıt olmak zorundadır.
terms.usage_example_en: Companies must be registered in the trade registry.

terms.definition_tr: Şirket ortaklarının oluşturduğu en yüksek organ
terms.definition_en: Highest organ composed of company partners
terms.usage_example_en: General assembly makes company decisions.

terms.definition_en: Management and representation organ of company
terms.usage_example_tr: Yönetim kurulu anonim şirketin zorunlu organıdır.
terms.usage_example_en: Board of directors is the mandatory organ of joint stock company.

terms.definition_tr: Limited şirketin yönetim ve temsil organı
terms.definition_en: Management and representation organ of limited company
terms.usage_example_tr: Limited şirkette müdürler şirketi temsil eder.
terms.usage_example_en: In limited company, directors represent the company.

7. İş Hukuku.description: İş ilişkileri ve iş hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: İşçi ve işveren arasındaki ilişkileri düzenleyen hukuk dalı
terms.definition_en: Branch of law regulating relations between employee and employer
terms.usage_example_tr: İş hukuku İş Kanunu ile düzenlenir.
terms.usage_example_en: Labor law is regulated by Labor Code.

terms.definition_en: Person working under dependency to employer
terms.usage_example_en: Employee works under employment contract.

terms.definition_tr: İşçi çalıştıran gerçek veya tüzel kişi
terms.definition_en: Real or legal person employing workers
terms.usage_example_en: Employer is obliged to pay wage to employee.

terms.definition_tr: İşçinin iş görme, işverenin ücret ödeme yükümlülüğü doğuran sözleşme
terms.definition_en: Contract creating obligation for employee to work and employer to pay wage
terms.usage_example_en: Employment contract should be in writing.

terms.definition_tr: İşçi ve işveren arasındaki bağımlılık ilişkisi
terms.definition_en: Dependency relationship between employee and employer
terms.usage_example_tr: İş ilişkisi bağımlılık unsuru ile karakterize edilir.
terms.usage_example_en: Employment relationship is characterized by dependency element.

terms.definition_tr: Asıl işverenden iş alarak işçi çalıştıran işveren
terms.definition_en: Employer who takes work from main contractor and employs workers
terms.usage_example_en: Rights of subcontractor workers are protected.

terms.definition_en: Place where work is carried out by employer
terms.usage_example_en: Workplace change requires employee's consent.

terms.definition_en: Payment received by employee in exchange for labor
terms.usage_example_en: Wage cannot be less than minimum wage.

terms.definition_tr: İşyerinde veya iş dolayısıyla meydana gelen kaza
terms.definition_en: Accident occurring in workplace or due to work
terms.usage_example_en: Industrial accident is covered by social security.

terms.definition_en: Ending of employment contract
terms.usage_example_en: Termination notice should be with notice period.

8. Aile Hukuku.description: Aile ilişkileri ve aile hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: Erkek ve kadın arasında kurulan yasal birliktelik
terms.definition_en: Legal union between man and woman
terms.usage_example_en: Marriage is regulated by Civil Code.

terms.definition_en: Treating another's child as one's own child
terms.usage_example_tr: Evlat edinme mahkeme kararı ile yapılır.
terms.usage_example_en: Adoption is done by court decision.

terms.definition_tr: Kan bağı, evlilik veya evlat edinme ile kurulan yakınlık
terms.definition_en: Closeness established by blood, marriage or adoption
terms.usage_example_en: Kinship produces legal consequences.

terms.definition_en: Ending of marriage bond
terms.usage_example_en: Divorce is done by court decision.

terms.definition_en: Person with limited capacity to act
terms.usage_example_en: Curator is appointed to incompetent person.

terms.definition_tr: Ebeveynin çocuk üzerindeki hak ve yetkilerinin bütünü
terms.definition_en: Total rights and authorities of parents over child
terms.usage_example_en: Parental custody should remain with parents.

terms.definition_en: Person managing affairs of incompetent person
terms.usage_example_tr: Kayyım tayini mahkeme kararı ile olur.
terms.usage_example_en: Appointment of curator is by court decision.

terms.definition_en: Bond established with intention to marry
terms.usage_example_en: If engagement is broken, damage is compensated.

terms.definition_en: Marriage ceremony
terms.usage_example_en: Wedding should be done officially.

terms.definition_en: Regulation regarding property in marriage
terms.usage_example_en: Property regime contract can be made.

terms.definition_tr: Suçları ve cezaları düzenleyen hukuk dalı
terms.definition_en: Branch of law regulating crimes and punishments
terms.usage_example_tr: Ceza hukuku Ceza Kanunu ile düzenlenir.
terms.usage_example_en: Criminal law is regulated by Criminal Code.

terms.definition_en: Act punished by law
terms.usage_example_en: Person who commits crime is punished.

terms.definition_en: Sanction given to person who commits crime
terms.usage_example_en: Punishments are specified in Turkish Criminal Code.

terms.definition_en: Liberty-restricting punishment
terms.usage_example_en: Serious crimes require imprisonment.

terms.definition_en: Punishment paid with money
terms.usage_example_tr: Hafif suçlar para cezası ile cezalandırılabilir.
terms.usage_example_en: Minor crimes can be punished with fine.

terms.definition_en: Handing over accused to court
terms.usage_example_en: Accused surrenders.

terms.definition_en: Holding suspect under police supervision
terms.usage_example_en: Detention period is specified in law.

terms.definition_en: Imprisonment of accused during trial period
terms.usage_example_en: Pre-trial detention is generally prohibited.

terms.definition_tr: Savcının sanık hakkında düzenlediği resmî belge
terms.definition_en: Official document prepared by prosecutor regarding accused
terms.usage_example_en: Indictment is submitted to court.

terms.definition_en: Finding accused not guilty
terms.usage_example_tr: Beraat kararı beraat etmek fiili ile verilir.
terms.usage_example_en: Acquittal decision is given with act of being acquitted.

10. Usul Hukuku.description: Yargılama usulleri ve usul hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_en: Branch of law regulating judicial procedures
terms.usage_example_tr: Usul hukuku Hukuk Usulü Muhakemeleri Kanunu ile düzenlenir.
terms.usage_example_en: Procedural law is regulated by Civil Procedure Code.

terms.definition_en: Demand for legal remedy before court
terms.usage_example_en: Filing lawsuit is one of the ways to seek rights.

terms.definition_en: Party filing the lawsuit
terms.usage_example_en: Plaintiff must prove their case.

terms.definition_en: Party against whom lawsuit is filed
terms.usage_example_en: Defendant must make their defense.

terms.definition_en: Person judging lawsuits
terms.usage_example_en: Judge renders decision.

terms.definition_tr: Vekaletnamesi ile dava takip eden kişi
terms.definition_en: Person pursuing lawsuit with power of attorney
terms.usage_example_en: Attorney represents client.

terms.definition_tr: Hakikati ortaya çıkaracak belge veya bilgi
terms.definition_en: Document or information revealing truth
terms.usage_example_en: Presenting evidence is duty of parties.

terms.definition_en: Expenses incurred during trial
terms.usage_example_en: Judicial expenses belong to losing party.

terms.definition_en: Delivering official documents to other party
terms.usage_example_en: Notification should be done properly.

terms.definition_en: Folder where case-related documents are collected
terms.usage_example_en: File is kept in court registry.

11. Anayasa Hukuku.description: Devlet yapısı ve anayasa hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_tr: Devletin temel kuruluşunu düzenleyen en üst kanun
terms.definition_en: Highest law regulating basic structure of state
terms.usage_example_en: Constitution is the fundamental law of state.

terms.definition_en: Representative elected to parliament
terms.usage_example_en: Member of parliament is parliament member.

terms.definition_en: Function of making laws
terms.usage_example_en: Legislative organ is parliament.

terms.definition_en: Function of implementing laws
terms.usage_example_en: Executive organ is Presidency.

terms.definition_en: Function of resolving legal disputes
terms.usage_example_en: Judiciary is independent.

terms.definition_tr: Yasama, yürütme ve yargı güçlerinin birbirinden ayrılması
terms.definition_en: Separation of legislative, executive and judicial powers from each other
terms.usage_example_en: Separation of powers is foundation of democracy.

terms.definition_tr: Anayasa ile güvence altına alınan haklar
terms.definition_en: Rights guaranteed by constitution
terms.usage_example_en: Fundamental rights are granted to everyone.

terms.definition_en: Areas protected from state intervention
terms.usage_example_en: Public freedoms are not unlimited.

terms.definition_tr: Yetkilerin merkez ve eyaletler arasında paylaşıldığı devlet yapısı
terms.definition_en: State structure where powers are shared between center and provinces
terms.usage_example_en: Turkey has unitary state system.

terms.definition_en: System where executive power emerges from parliament
terms.usage_example_en: In parliamentary system, responsibility is collective.

12. İdari Hukuk.description: Devlet idaresi ve idari hukuk terimleri

terms.definition_en: Part of state carrying out public service
terms.usage_example_en: Administration is bound to law.

terms.definition_en: Unilateral legal act of administration
terms.usage_example_en: Administrative act can be annulled.

terms.definition_en: Services provided by state to citizens
terms.usage_example_en: Education is a public service.

terms.definition_en: Administrative organs of central government
terms.usage_example_en: Ministries belong to central administration.

terms.definition_en: Local government units
terms.usage_example_en: Municipalities are local administration.

terms.definition_en: Organized structure of state institutions
terms.usage_example_en: State organization is regulated by law.

terms.definition_en: Work that public servant must do
terms.usage_example_en: Duty is determined by law.

terms.definition_en: Right to do something
terms.usage_example_en: Authority is given by law.

terms.definition_en: Person working in state service
terms.usage_example_en: Civil servants are subject to private law.

terms.definition_en: Regulatory act of administration
terms.usage_example_en: Regulatory act is published in official gazette.

13. Vergi Hukuku.description: Vergi sistemi ve vergi hukuku terimleri

terms.definition_en: Compulsory payment taken by state from citizens
terms.usage_example_en: Tax is imposed by law.

terms.definition_en: Person with obligation to pay tax
terms.usage_example_tr: Her vergi mükellefi gelir beyannamesi vermelidir.
terms.usage_example_en: Every taxpayer must file income declaration.

terms.definition_en: State institution collecting taxes
terms.usage_example_en: Application is made to tax office.

terms.definition_tr: Vergi koyma ve tahsil etme işlemi
terms.definition_en: Act of imposing and collecting tax
terms.usage_example_en: Taxation is done by law.

terms.definition_en: Tax taken on income
terms.usage_example_en: Income tax has progressive rates.

terms.definition_tr: Mal ve hizmetler üzerinden alınan vergi
terms.definition_en: Tax taken on goods and services
terms.usage_example_en: VAT is passed on to consumer.

terms.definition_en: Tax taken on immovable property
terms.usage_example_en: Property tax is collected annually.

terms.definition_en: Control of tax base
terms.usage_example_en: Documents are examined during tax audit.

terms.definition_en: Sanction applied in tax evasion
terms.usage_example_en: Penalty is imposed for tax evasion.

terms.definition_en: Forgiveness of tax debts
terms.usage_example_en: Tax amnesty can be done by law.

14. Uluslararası Hukuk.description: Uluslararası ilişkiler ve uluslararası hukuk terimleri

terms.definition_en: Legal agreement between states
terms.usage_example_en: Treaty does not enter into force without ratification.

terms.definition_en: Economic partnership between states
terms.usage_example_tr: Ekonomik işbirliği serbest ticaret anlaşmalarını içerir.
terms.usage_example_en: Economic cooperation includes free trade agreements.

terms.definition_tr: Bir devletin diğer devletteki resmi temsilciliği
terms.definition_en: Official representation of one state in another
terms.usage_example_en: Embassy is diplomatic mission.

terms.definition_en: Measure being proportional to purpose
terms.usage_example_en: Principle of proportionality applies in international law.

terms.definition_tr: Yabancılık unsuru içeren özel hukuk ilişkilerini düzenleyen hukuk dalı
terms.definition_en: Branch of law regulating private law relations with foreign element
terms.usage_example_tr: Devletler özel hukuku iktisas mahkemesi mevcuttur.
terms.usage_example_en: There is a specialized court for private international law.

terms.definition_tr: İki devlete aynı anda bağlı olma
terms.definition_en: Being simultaneously tied to two states
terms.usage_example_en: Dual citizenship is subject to some limitations.

terms.definition_en: Handing over criminal
terms.usage_example_en: Extradition is done by agreement.

terms.definition_en: Judicial immunity
terms.usage_example_en: Ambassadors have immunity.

terms.definition_en: Passport given to diplomatic personnel
terms.usage_example_en: Diplomatic passport is exempt from visa.

terms.definition_tr: Hukuki konularda görüş bildiren üçüncü taraf
terms.definition_en: Third party expressing opinion on legal matters
terms.usage_example_tr: Uluslararası mahkemelerde amicus curiae görüşleri alınır.
terms.usage_example_en: Amicus curiae opinions are received in international courts.

15. Fikri Mülkiyet Hukuku.description: Telif hakları ve fikri mülkiyet terimleri

terms.definition_en: Rights of work owner over their work
